Plenty of dishes benefit from a splash of the sweet—or dry—fortified wine. It’s time to look beyond the Martini and Manhattan monopoly. When it comes to Martinis, the possibilities are so endless it can be overwhelming. These are a few standouts you should try.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1443536457717{padding-top: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][service_box icon="icon icon-retweet" title="POCKER PLAY" desc="We have a corner of pocker table for you to hang out with your friends"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][service_box icon="icon icon-party1" title="NIGHT OUT" desc="For your lonely nights, we are here up all nights for you"][vc_empty_space height="30px"][service_box icon="icon icon-glass16" title="TROPHY WIFE" desc="Just kidding. item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1441253108877{padding-top: 30px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5"][vc_single_image image="356" img_size="full" el_class="hidden-xs hidden-sm"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7"][heading text="PLACE YOU CAN CREATE YOUR OWN DRINKS"][/heading][vc_column_text]PThe cocktails served at Fragrances always contain similar ingredients to the perfumes themselves. “Think of perfumes as a different kind of gin or flavored vodka. They’re basically alcohol distilled with flavors—and sometimes they cpntains love. Balance is essential in scent-themed cocktails, he stresses. While the initial aromas “are definitely more exotic and therefore in the beginning more intense, once you get used to them they are not so dominant.” Heissen avoids scents that are alcohol-heavy and could lead to an imbalanced drink.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Experienced Bartenders
  • Drinks with unique flavor
  • Rich diversity of liquor collections
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
  • Provide the best service
  • Awesome dishes
  • Pocker play zone

item.title: 5 SPRINGY RIFFS RECIPES
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As spring rears its damned gorgeous head and fills the air with the sweet perfumed scents of life “in bloom,” it must be met with equally explosive white wines of aromatic intensity and bright fruit character. So much intensity that the flowers will turn from the sun to bend toward your glass...

item.title: WHERE PERFUME & COCKTAIL MEET
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Fragrances’ conceit sounds like an impossible gimmick: a bar where perfume and other scents are the star cocktail ingredients. Once you hear Heissen arguing the concept’s clear logic, doubts start to fall away like the trickles of a fading perfume...

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
As spring rears its damned gorgeous head and fills the air with the sweet perfumed scents of life “in bloom,” it must be met with equally explosive white wines of aromatic intensity and bright fruit character. So much intensity that the flowers will turn from the sun to bend toward your glass...

item.title: Aron Prince
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: It was such a interesting time haning out with friends here. They have the best cocktail and pure touch of original liquor. I think Robusta is the place I would love to come back again.
